Welcome to PokéTeams

Build some unique Pokémon teams that you might use in-game. It's free to use!

Sign Up

Features

Pokédex

Explore the latest Pokédex right in your browser and view detailed information for each Pokémon.

Moves

Find your favorite moves, learn what makes them wrong, and use them to create competitive movesets.

Teams

Build several teams for the different battles you might encounter, including adding items that your Pokémon may use in battle.
